name: Inner Child (Global Game Jam 2022)
description:
We hope to express a therapeutic method of "inner child" therapy through the game.Through the forced switching between different characters(different identities) and their different abilities to show the contradictions between them.Then they help each other, tolerate each other, and finally reach a reconciliation. 

W A S D to move , E to continue the dialogue , R to reset , ESC to get back to the title,SPACE to flip to another character(identity).

Developers:

EmanonZ, MayoZuo, SkywalkerWan, Shenshuozhi
